response.original_title: After Divorce, I Built a Fabulous Life
response.overview: A once-talented designer, Mia married Tyler for love and became a housewife after graduation. However, a three-year marriage ended with a divorce decree. Tyler's heartlessness prompts Mia to give up her hope, leading her to reclaim her beloved career. Eventually, Mia shines in her passion, and Tyler realizes his true feelings, allowing them to rediscover love.
response.title: After Divorce, I Built a Fabulous Life
